title: Happy New Year Lyrics Unnai Ninaithu
stanzas:
happy new year
happy new year vandhadhe,
anbai solli aasai ullam thulludhe,

surya gandhi poo pola,
mugam maaruthae,
sugam serudhe.

happy new year
happy new year vandhadhe,
anbai solli aasai ullam thulludhe,

vaaranam aayiram,
soolla varam seiydhu,
naarana nambi,
nadakkindraan indredhir,
poorana porkudam,
vaiththu pooravengum,
thoarana naatta
kanaa kandaen, tholi,


engal vaalvai kavithai 
thoguppaay aakkallaam,
anjal valiyae ellorukkum
 anuppallaam,


vaanatthu megamaay
naam saernthu pogallaam.
poonkotthai polavae
mugam vaitthu vaazhallaam


nam sirippai padam piditthu,
vaazhthu madalai vannangidallaam,

nootraandai thaandiyum,
nam paerai naalai,
nilaithidallaamae,

happy new year ..
anbai solli aasai ullam
thulludhe..

thulasi chediyil malaiyin 
thuliyai polavae.
engal vizhiyil 
aanandhaththin eeramae.

Poovil orr paaththiram,
naam seiythu paarkkalaam.
paal soarai pottu naam
paravaikkum oottallaam.

kudai pidikkum thennai maram,
nammathu gunam solliyadhae,
vaazhnaatkal yaavumae.
vasanthangal veesa
vaazhnthiruppoamae.

happy new year
happy new year vandhadhe,
anbai solli aasai 
ullam thulludhe,

surya gandhi poo pola,
mugam maaruthae,
sugam serudhe.

seo.title: Happy New Year Lyrics Unnai Ninaithu
